review: This is a great little device.  Does what it claims to do well. Picture is great, speed is great. I love the voice search button too. Love how prime videos are separated and when you click more ways to watch it will show, in case hulu has it for free.  Two things though. 1st of all please fix the bug that hulu plus has right now. I don't get the picture,  only sound, which is a common problem from the reviews.  2nd of all the cable that connects to the device and TV is sold separately.  I wish I knew because I had to wait for the cable after I received the device. Other than that it's great.
